text: The Ford Bronco Sport is a compact Crossover SUV made by Ford since 2020 its sold under the Bronco name. == History and Features == The Ford Bronco Sport was launched alongside the normal Bronco in 2020. the Bronco Sport has a retro and off-road styling and shares its plataform with the Ford Escape and the Ford Maverick the Ford Bronco Sport has all-wheel drive system called G.O.A.T (goes over any terrain).Wendler, Andrew - Taming The Trails: Ford Opens Off- Road Schools For Four-Wheeling Adventurers. Forbes, June 2, 2021 the SUV also has a 1.5 and 2.0 liter both turbo Ecoboost engines with a 8-speed automatic transmission it was improved in 2025. == Markets == The Ford Bronco Sport is currently sold mainly in the Americas specifically South America and North America but also its sold in Middle East. == References == Category:Ford automobiles Category:2020s automobiles Category:Sport utility vehicles
title: Ford Bronco Sport
